description: This file is an include (.inc) script used in a build system (likely BitBake for Yocto Project) to configure and set up the build of GStreamer 1.0 plugin sets. It defines dependencies, build options, conditional configurations, and comments explaining plugin features like Orc JIT compilation and NLS support.

methods.name: gettext_oemeson
methods.description: Function to determine the appropriate NLS configuration string based on build variables 'USE_NLS' and 'INHIBIT_DEFAULT_DEPS'.
